scripts.test: npm run test:back && npm run test:front
scripts.test:front: docker-compose -p test-front -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm front npm test
scripts.test:front:snapshots: docker-compose -p test-front -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm front npm test -- -u
scripts.test:back: docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm node npm test; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml stop db; docker-compose -p test-back -f docker-compose.test.yml rm -f db
